Class DistributionEditor.ListItemTransferHandler

  • java.lang.Object

    java.io.Serializable

    DistributionEditor
    private static class DistributionEditor.ListItemTransferHandler
extends javax.swing.TransferHandler
    This is needed to enable drag and drop interaction in the list. Source: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/dnd/dropmodedemo.html
